trans-unit.resname: C16·1 | Duelist's Heritage | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Duelist's Heritage
trans-unit.target: 斗客的遗产

trans-unit.resname: C16·1 | Duelist's Heritage | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever one or more creatures attack, you may have target attacking creature gain double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个或数个生物攻击时，你可以使目标进行攻击的生物获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: C16·2 | Entrapment Maneuver | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Entrapment Maneuver
trans-unit.target: 诱捕计略

trans-unit.resname: C16·2 | Entrapment Maneuver | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Target player sacrifices an attacking creature. You create X 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens, where X is that creature's toughness.
trans-unit.target: 目标牌手牺牲一个进行攻击的生物。你派出X个1/1白色士兵衍生生物，X为该生物的防御力。

trans-unit.resname: C16·3 | Orzhov Advokist | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Orzhov Advokist
trans-unit.target: 欧佐夫倡议人

trans-unit.resname: C16·3 | Orzhov Advokist | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your upkeep, each player may put two +1/+1 counters on a creature they control. If a player does, creatures that player controls can't attack you or planeswalkers you control until your next turn.
trans-unit.target: 在你的维持开始时，每位牌手各可以在一个由其操控的生物上放置两个+1/+1指示物。若有牌手如此作，则直到你的下一个回合，由该牌手操控的生物不能攻击你或由你操控的鹏洛客。

trans-unit.resname: C16·4 | Selfless Squire | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Selfless Squire
trans-unit.target: 无私扈从

trans-unit.resname: C16·4 | Selfless Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flash
trans-unit.target: 闪现

trans-unit.resname: C16·4 | Selfless Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, prevent all damage that would be dealt to you this turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，防止本回合中将对你造成的所有伤害。

trans-unit.resname: C16·4 | Selfless Squire | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Whenever damage that would be dealt to you is prevented, put that many +1/+1 counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当任一效应防止将对你造成的伤害时，在CARDNAME上放置等量的+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·5 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sublime Exhalation
trans-unit.target: 升灵吐息

trans-unit.resname: C16·5 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: C16·5 | Sublime Exhalation | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy all creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭所有生物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·6 | Coastal Breach | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Coastal Breach
trans-unit.target: 裂岸怒涛

trans-unit.resname: C16·6 | Coastal Breach | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: C16·6 | Coastal Breach | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return all nonland permanents to their owners' hands.
trans-unit.target: 将所有非地永久物移回其拥有者手上。

trans-unit.resname: C16·7 | Deepglow Skate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Deepglow Skate
trans-unit.target: 渊光鳐

trans-unit.resname: C16·7 | Deepglow Skate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, double the number of each kind of counter on any number of target permanents.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，选择任意数量的目标永久物。将这些永久物上面的各种指示物数量加倍。

trans-unit.resname: C16·8 | Faerie Artisans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Faerie Artisans
trans-unit.target: 仙灵工匠

trans-unit.resname: C16·8 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: C16·8 | Faerie Artisans | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, create a token that's a copy of that creature except it's an artifact in addition to its other types. Then exile all other tokens created with CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当一个非衍生物的生物在对手操控下进战场时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该生物的复制品，但额外具有神器此类别。然后放逐所有以CARDNAME派出的其他衍生物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·9 | Grip of Phyresis | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Grip of Phyresis
trans-unit.target: 非瑞化之攫

trans-unit.resname: C16·9 | Grip of Phyresis | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Gain control of target Equipment, then create a 0/0 black Phyrexian Germ creature token and attach that Equipment to it.
trans-unit.target: 获得目标武具的操控权，然后派出一个0/0黑色病菌衍生生物，并将该武具装备于其上。

trans-unit.resname: C16·10 | Manifold Insights | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Manifold Insights
trans-unit.target: 多相眼光

trans-unit.resname: C16·10 | Manifold Insights | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Reveal the top ten cards of your library. Starting with the next opponent in turn order, each opponent chooses a different nonland card from among them. Put the chosen cards into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 展示你牌库顶的十张牌。所有对手依照回合的顺序，从接下来的对手开始，各选择其中一张非地牌，且不能重复选择。将被选中的牌置于你手上，并将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: C16·11 | Cruel Entertainment | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cruel Entertainment
trans-unit.target: 苦笑言欢

trans-unit.resname: C16·11 | Cruel Entertainment | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Choose target player and another target player. The first player controls the second player during the second player's next turn, and the second player controls the first player during the first player's next turn.
trans-unit.target: 选择目标牌手和另一位目标牌手。后者牌手在其下个回合由前者牌手操控，且前者牌手在其下个回合由后者牌手操控。

trans-unit.resname: C16·12 | Curse of Vengeance | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curse of Vengeance
trans-unit.target: 复仇诅咒

trans-unit.resname: C16·12 | Curse of Vengeance | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Enchant player
trans-unit.target: 结附于牌手

trans-unit.resname: C16·12 | Curse of Vengeance | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Whenever enchanted player casts a spell, put a spite counter on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 每当所结附的牌手施放咒语时，在CARDNAME上放置一个怨恨指示物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·12 | Curse of Vengeance | Card Text | Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: When enchanted player loses the game, you gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of spite counters on CARDNAME.
trans-unit.target: 当所结附的牌手输掉这盘游戏时，你获得X点生命且抓X张牌，X为CARDNAME上怨恨指示物的数量。

trans-unit.resname: C16·13 | Curtains' Call | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Curtains' Call
trans-unit.target: 谢幕演出

trans-unit.resname: C16·13 | Curtains' Call | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: C16·13 | Curtains' Call | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Destroy two target creatures.
trans-unit.target: 消灭两个目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: C16·14 | Magus of the Will | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Magus of the Will
trans-unit.target: 意志贤者

trans-unit.resname: C16·14 | Magus of the Will | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {2}{B}, {T}, Exile CARDNAME: Until end of turn, you may play lands and cast spells from your graveyard. If a card would be put into your graveyard from anywhere this turn, exile that card instead.
trans-unit.target: {2}{B}，{T}，放逐CARDNAME：直到回合结束，你可以从你的坟墓场中使用地和施放咒语。本回合中，如果某牌将从任何区域置入你的坟墓场，则改为放逐该牌。

trans-unit.resname: C16·15 | Parting Thoughts | Card Name

trans-unit.target: 临终思绪

trans-unit.resname: C16·15 | Parting Thoughts | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature. You draw X cards and you lose X life, where X is the number of counters on that creature.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标生物。你抓X张牌且失去X点生命，X为该生物上的指示物数量。

trans-unit.resname: C16·16 | Charging Cinderhorn | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Charging Cinderhorn
trans-unit.target: 烬角蛮牛

trans-unit.resname: C16·16 | Charging Cinderhorn | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Haste
trans-unit.target: 敏捷

trans-unit.resname: C16·16 | Charging Cinderhorn | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of each player's end step, if no creatures attacked this turn, put a fury counter on CARDNAME. Then CARDNAME deals damage equal to the number of fury counters on it to that player.
trans-unit.target: 在每位牌手的结束步骤开始时，若本回合中没有生物攻击过，则在CARDNAME上放置一个狂怒指示物。然后CARDNAME对该牌手造成伤害，其数量等同于其上狂怒指示物的数量。

trans-unit.resname: C16·17 | Divergent Transformations | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Divergent Transformations
trans-unit.target: 趋异转化

trans-unit.resname: C16·17 | Divergent Transformations | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Undaunted (This spell costs {1} less to cast for each opponent.)
trans-unit.target: 不屈（每有一位对手，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。）

trans-unit.resname: C16·17 | Divergent Transformations | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Exile two target creatures. For each of those creatures, its controller reveals cards from the top of their library until they reveal a creature card, puts that card onto the battlefield, then shuffles the rest into their library.
trans-unit.target: 放逐两个目标生物。对每个这类生物而言，其操控者从其牌库顶开始展示牌，直到展示出一张生物牌为止，将该牌放进战场，然后将其余的牌洗入其牌库。

trans-unit.resname: C16·18 | Frenzied Fugue | Card Name

trans-unit.resname: C16·18 | Frenzied Fugue | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield or at the beginning of your upkeep, gain control of enchanted permanent until end of turn. Untap that permanent. It gains haste until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场或在你的维持开始时，获得所结附之永久物的操控权直到回合结束。重置该永久物。它获得敏捷异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.target: 在每位对手的结束步骤开始时，该牌手派出一个1/1红色鬼怪衍生生物，且具有「由你操控的生物每次战斗若能攻击，则必须攻击。」

trans-unit.target: {5}{R}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：每位牌手弃掉其手牌，然后各抓七张牌。

trans-unit.target: 重置所有生物。直到回合结束，每当一个由对手操控的生物阻挡时，抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: C16·21 | Benefactor's Draught | Card Text | Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.

trans-unit.source: Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, as you cast spells from your hand this turn, they gain cascade. (When you cast the spell, exile cards from the top of your library until you exile a nonland card that costs less. You may cast it without paying its mana cost. Put the exiled cards on the bottom of your library in a random order.)
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，对你从你手上施放的咒语而言，它于你本回合中你如此施放时获得倾曳异能。（当你施放该咒语时，从你的牌库顶开始放逐牌，直到放逐一张费用比其低的非地牌为止。你可以施放该牌，且不需支付其法术力费用。将所放逐的牌以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。）
